title: One hour and twelve minutes left to live
creator_credit: Charlie Safstrom, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Charlie Safstrom served as a sniper in Borneo during World War II. Here he recounts one of the more frightening moments of his service where he was almost mistaken for a Japanese soldier during a late night changing of the guard.
